TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataListCommandEventHandler(object source, DataListCommandEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataListCommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataListCommandEventHandler(source As Object, e As DataListCommandEventArgs)
public delegate void DataListCommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ source, DataListCommandEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項的 、、、 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the , , , , and events of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時`Cancel`按鈕中的項目按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the `Cancel` button for an item in the control is clicked. 就會引發事件時`Delete`按鈕中的項目按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the `Delete` button for an item in the control is clicked. 就會引發事件時`Edit`按鈕中的項目按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the `Edit` button for an item in the control is clicked. 任何按鈕中的項目時，就會引發事件按一下控制項時。The event is raised when any button for an item in the control is clicked. 這可讓您以程式設計的方式測試按一下特定的命令按鈕時，並採取適當的動作。This allows you to programmatically test for when a specific command button is clicked and take appropriate action. 此事件通常用來處理自訂命令的按鈕控制項。This event is commonly used to handle custom command buttons for the control. 就會引發事件時`Update`按鈕中的項目按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the `Update` button for an item in the control is clicked. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義事件處理常式， ，和事件控制項。The following example demonstrates how to define event handlers for the , , and events of a control. 這個範例會指定事件處理常式以宣告方式，在設定每個命令內容的事件處理常式控制項。This example specifies the event handlers declaratively, setting the event handler for each command property on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit/CS/datalisteditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit/VB/datalisteditvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定事件處理常式，並以程式設計方式加入它們中的事件`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handlers and programmatically add them to the events in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListEdit2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit2/CS/datalistedit2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListEdit2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit2/VB/datalistedit2vb.aspx#1)]
